text: [Heads Up] In the very near future we will be pushing an update to our Memberships functionality that lets you override our default settings for registration info like company name, admin, log in/ out links (solves the / issue).  Template and module customization are *not* a part of this roll-out (the tab is just for design purposes) but are in the works as well.  Get excited, ya'll!

I've got a couple users saying they can't log in. I'm about 4 steps removed from this so it's a bit hard for me to say if they're doing something wrong, but is this something someone at HS familiar with this could look at? Support doesn't really seem to know much about the membership feature.
yeah I can take a look
any portalId/emails I should look for?
Same portal as before, I'll dm you
